reviewText:
After getting this DVD from our local Library we got in loved with it.  My children really enjoy every part of it so we decided to buy it.
It is a fun educational material
My kids love the puppet Capo and sing along while I learn how to play the guitar. I have tried different methods and this is the first that works. Very easily explained. Awesome work. Thanks.

To all the people at iplaymusic, I would just like to say a very big thank you to one and all , for the Play Music Together DVD. It is fantastic! Very easy to follow and our kids have fun singing and dancing along with Capo. Great product! You are the best. Thanks.
